title: Karl fear of cats what is UCS

content.description:
Question is based on the following.

Karl goes to see Dr. Norton to help him overcome his fear of cats. Karl’s fear began in childhood when he petted a cat and someone slammed a door. Every time Karl petted the cat, the door slammed. Now whenever Karl sees a cat, he becomes very anxious.
content.question: In the development of Karl’s fear of cats, what was the unconditioned stimulus (UCS) ?

choices.label: The person who slammed the door

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
